message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $100?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $115.
